description: Donald Trump picks Sen. JD Vance as running mate; Leaders on both sides call for civility after assassination attempt on Trump
title: 7/15: America Decides Special, RNC Day 1

description: Following a shooter's attempt to kill former President Trump, conspiracy theories, digitally altered images and misinformation spread across social media platforms.
title: Misinformation, conspiracy theories swirl in wake of Trump shooting

description: A gunman opened fire at former President Donald Trump's rally on Saturday, grazing Trump's ear with a bullet and killing a bystander.
title: Trump makes first public appearance since assassination attempt

description: The 2024 Republican National Convention began Monday in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. "CBS Evening News" anchor and managing editor Norah O'Donnell spoke with Republican National Committee Chair Michael Whatley to get his thoughts on the first day of the event.
title: Republican National Committee chair reflects on Day 1 of convention

description: In the wake of the assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump, party leaders are urging the country to embrace one word: Unity. But what definition of unity are they talking about, and what's the goal of said "unity"? CBS News chief political analyst John Dickerson explains.
title: John Dickerson on the meaning of unity

description: An attorney for New Jersey Sen. Bob Menendez's wife said last month that she had "invasive cancer surgery" and is in "intense, chronic pain."
title: Nadine Menendez's trial postponed indefinitely

description: Milwaukee is hosting the 2024 Republican National Convention this week. It's just about 90 minutes away from where the party was born 170 years ago. CBS News Sunday Morning correspondent Mo Rocca looks at the GOP's history.
title: Looking back at the history of the Republican Party

description: Israel launched new strikes on the southern and central Gaza Strip on Monday, the second such attack in just the last three days. The weekend air strike killed at least 90 people who were seeking shelter in a designated humanitarian zone. CBS News' Holly Williams reports.
title: Israel launches new strikes on Gaza amid ongoing cease-fire talks

description: Alaska Sen. Dan Sullivan reacted to former President Donald Trump picking Ohio Sen. JD Vance as his running mate, Saturday's assassination attempt on Trump and more.
title: Alaska Sen. Dan Sullivan reacts to Trump picking JD Vance as his running mate and more

description: According to researchers, mass shooters in the U.S. tend to fit a specific profile. University professors Jillian Peterson and James Densley compiled a database of detailed life histories of 180 U.S. mass shooters to look for early warning signs. Peterson, executive director of the Violence Prevention Project Research Center, joins CBS News to break down her findings in the wake of the assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump.
title: Gun violence researcher unpacks Trump rally shooting

description: Parts of Texas started the work week under a heat advisory with triple-digit temperatures expected through at least Wednesday. To make matters worse, hundreds of thousands of people are without power after Beryl slammed the state last week as a strong Category 1 hurricane. CBS News correspondent Janet Shamlian has more from the Lone Star State.
title: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott calls for investigation into Beryl power outages

description: Costco has a promotion on Gold Star Memberships and Executive Memberships this July.
title: July is the perfect time to join Costco

description: In a major legal victory for Donald Trump, a Trump-appointed judge dismissed the former president's federal classified documents case. Judge Aileen Cannon, who was overseeing the case, ruled Monday morning the appointment of special counsel Jack Smith was unconstitutional. CBS News legal contributor Jessica Levinson joins to unpack the ruling.
title: Breaking down the dismissal of Trump's classified documents case

description: Shortly after former President Donald Trump officially secured the GOP presidential nomination during the roll call vote at the Republican National Convention, Donald Trump Jr. explained to CBS News why he believes Ohio Sen. JD Vance is the best running mate for his father. CBS News senior White House and political correspondent Ed O'Keefe has more from the convention floor.
title: Donald Trump Jr. on why JD Vance is the best VP pick

description: Federal law enforcement agents are continuing their two investigations into the attempted assassination of former President Donald Trump at his rally in Butler, Pennsylvania, on Saturday. CBS News' Nicole Sganga and Meg Oliver have the latest.
title: Trump shooter's family cooperating with investigators, FBI says

description: The Republican National Convention is unfolding as the U.S. is still processing the attempt on former President Donald Trump's life. Party leaders are calling for national unity, which would be a distinct change of tone. Major Garrett assesses the possibility of lowering the red-hot rhetoric.
title: Political rhetoric ramps up in wake of Trump assassination attempt

description: New details are emerging about the gunman who shot at former President Donald Trump as he spoke at a rally in Pennsylvania. The shooter went to a gun range near Pittsburgh in the days before the shooting, and just hours ahead of the rally, he bought a box of ammunition for his father's AR-style rifle. Scott MacFarlane reports on the mounting questions about the security breakdown.
title: Questions mount over security breakdown that led to Trump rally shooting
